name: Sumo Spin
description:
2 Players, 1 Device! Rush your friend and shove them out!

It's all about charging and smashing in Sumo Spin.  Lock on to your opponent, build up power, then charge!  Smash them out of the ring to win!

Inspired by late-era Atari and early Nintendo games, Sumo Spin keeps it simple with a spinning mechanic and straightforward lock & load gameplay.  Bask in its sweet chunky pixels and relive the glory days of single mechanic sports-adjacent gaming!

Interested in beta-testing?  Wanna sign up for updates on Sumo Spin's development?  You can check out our newsletter sign-ups at LostDutchmanSoftware.com
